narrative.narrative: Jett8 Airlines was a cargo airline based at Singapore from operations start at June 23,2007 until August 2012. It had two 747-200F's to start and had them at the end also. It had scheduled service from SIN to Hong Kong,Dubai and Amsterdam. It did charters also and this was the focus of its last year in operations. Its founder and ceo Louis Tan was a former Singapore Airlines pilot. Both of its 747's had also belonged to Nippon Cargo Airlines of Japan beforehand.
